name: THM-1312 THREAT DATABASE
description:
i like making generators as fiction-writing tools, and sometimes those tools become toys
this is one of those
the only story here is the one you make up for the names that scroll down the screen

note: sound will begin to play when you click the screen

Using perchance.org and a rad template by Erik Österberg @ https://github.com/eosterberg/terminaljs
